entry.title: Backward deterministic R Value
entry.summary: Nicolas Dorier and Rusty Russell had a conversation regarding the concept of solving hashes in advance. Nicolas explained that if Alice wants to find the hash to the first commitment, she would need to hash the random secret seed 1000000 times. Rusty agreed with Nicolas' idea and shared a GitHub link to show the same problem using a different approach. The link is related to the shachain cryptography library written in C and available on GitHub.
